hook_problem.en: Start by identifying specific problems your target audience faces. Use relatable and emotional language. Examples: "Are you tired of..." or "Have you ever experienced..."
hook_problem.id: Mulai dengan mengidentifikasi masalah spesifik yang dialami target audiens. Gunakan bahasa yang relatable dan emosional. Contoh: "Capek gak sih kalau..." atau "Pernah nggak ngalamin..."

hook_target_call.en: Call out your target audience directly and specifically. Make them feel personally addressed. Examples: "For those of you who often..." or "Specifically for..."
hook_target_call.id: Panggil target audiens secara langsung dan spesifik. Buat mereka merasa dipanggil secara personal. Contoh: "Buat kamu yang sering..." atau "Khusus untuk para..."

hook_bold_claim.en: Make bold and surprising claims about your product. Must be provable and not exaggerated. Examples: "This is the only product that..." or "Guaranteed 100%..."
hook_bold_claim.id: Buat klaim yang berani dan mengejutkan tentang produk. Harus bisa dibuktikan dan tidak berlebihan. Contoh: "Ini satu-satunya produk yang..." atau "Dijamin 100%..."

hook_curiosity.en: Spark curiosity with incomplete information. Make the audience want to know more. Examples: "The secret that was never told..." or "It turns out all this time..."
hook_curiosity.id: Bangkitkan rasa penasaran dengan informasi yang tidak lengkap. Buat audiens ingin tahu lebih. Contoh: "Rahasia yang gak pernah diceritain..." atau "Ternyata selama ini..."

hook_social_proof.en: Use testimonials, numbers, or strong social proof. Show that many people have experienced the benefits. Examples: "Over 10,000+ people have..." or "Viral on TikTok because..."
hook_social_proof.id: Gunakan testimoni, angka, atau bukti sosial yang kuat. Tunjukkan bahwa banyak orang sudah merasakan manfaatnya. Contoh: "Udah 10.000+ orang yang..." atau "Viral di TikTok karena..."

hook_negativity_bias.en: Focus on negative consequences of not using the product. Use fear of missing out. Examples: "Don't regret not..." or "It's dangerous if you don't..."
hook_negativity_bias.id: Fokus pada konsekuensi negatif jika tidak menggunakan produk. Gunakan fear of missing out. Contoh: "Jangan sampai nyesal karena..." atau "Bahaya kalau kamu gak..."

hook_future_pacing.en: Invite audience to imagine the future with AI technology and sustainability. Use strong visualization about 2025 trends. Examples: "Imagine if AI could help you..." or "What would zero waste life feel like in 2025..."
hook_future_pacing.id: Ajak audiens membayangkan masa depan dengan teknologi AI dan sustainability. Gunakan visualisasi yang kuat tentang tren 2025. Contoh: "Bayangin kalau AI bisa bantu kamu..." atau "Gimana rasanya hidup zero waste di 2025..."

hook_question.en: Start with questions about 2025 digital trends, mental health, or sustainability. Must be relevant to current issues. Examples: "Why does Gen Alpha prefer sustainable products?" or "Do you know why AI can now...?"
hook_question.id: Mulai dengan pertanyaan tentang tren digital 2025, mental health, atau sustainability. Harus relevan dengan isu terkini. Contoh: "Kenapa Gen Alpha lebih pilih produk sustainable?" atau "Tau gak kenapa AI sekarang bisa...?"

hook_solution.en: Offer solutions for modern 2025 problems: burnout, digital detox, climate anxiety, or AI integration. Examples: "The easiest way to digital detox..." or "Anti-burnout solution that went viral in 2025..."
hook_solution.id: Tawarkan solusi untuk masalah modern 2025: burnout, digital detox, climate anxiety, atau AI integration. Contoh: "Cara termudah untuk digital detox..." atau "Solusi anti-burnout yang viral di 2025..."

hook_statistic.en: Use latest 2025 data about AI adoption, sustainability, mental health awareness, or Gen Alpha behavior. Examples: "Turns out 95% of Gen Alpha care more about environment..." or "2025 research proves AI can..."
hook_statistic.id: Gunakan data terbaru 2025 tentang AI adoption, sustainability, mental health awareness, atau Gen Alpha behavior. Contoh: "Ternyata 95% Gen Alpha lebih peduli lingkungan..." atau "Penelitian 2025 buktikan AI bisa..."

hook_experimental.en: Invite audience to join viral 2025 challenges: sustainability challenge, AI productivity test, or mindfulness experiment. Examples: "Try this 30-day sustainability challenge..." or "Test how productive you are with AI..."
hook_experimental.id: Ajak audiens ikut challenge viral 2025: sustainability challenge, AI productivity test, atau mindfulness experiment. Contoh: "Coba deh 30-day sustainability challenge..." atau "Test seberapa produktif kamu dengan AI..."

hook_tension.en: Build tension about 2025 issues: climate crisis, AI replacement anxiety, or digital overwhelm. Examples: "Almost lost my job because of AI..." or "Tense moments during climate change..."
hook_tension.id: Bangun ketegangan tentang isu 2025: climate crisis, AI replacement anxiety, atau digital overwhelm. Contoh: "Hampir aja kehilangan pekerjaan karena AI..." atau "Detik-detik menegangkan saat climate change..."

hook_surprise.en: Plot twist about 2025 misconceptions: AI myths, sustainability facts, or Gen Alpha behavior. Examples: "What you think is dangerous about AI, turns out..." or "Plot twist: Gen Alpha is actually wiser..."
hook_surprise.id: Plot twist tentang misconception 2025: AI myths, sustainability facts, atau Gen Alpha behavior. Contoh: "Yang kamu pikir AI berbahaya, ternyata..." atau "Plot twist: Gen Alpha ternyata lebih wise..."

hook_list.en: Use list format about 2025 trends, AI tools, sustainable living, or mental health tips. Examples: "5 AI tools you must try in 2025..." or "3 sustainable habits that went viral..."
hook_list.id: Gunakan format daftar tentang tren 2025, AI tools, sustainable living, atau mental health tips. Contoh: "5 AI tools yang wajib kamu coba 2025..." atau "3 sustainable habits yang viral..."

hook_story.en: Start with personal story about 2025 technology adaptation, mental health journey, or sustainable lifestyle. Examples: "I used to be skeptical about AI, but..." or "My burnout story in the digital era..."
hook_story.id: Mulai dengan cerita personal tentang adaptasi teknologi 2025, mental health journey, atau sustainable lifestyle. Contoh: "Dulu aku skeptis sama AI, tapi..." atau "Cerita burnout aku di era digital..."

hook_comparison.en: Compare pre-AI vs post-AI life, traditional vs sustainable living, or Gen Z vs Gen Alpha mindset. Examples: "The difference between life before and after AI..." or "Gen Z vs Gen Alpha: who is wiser?"
hook_comparison.id: Bandingkan life pre-AI vs post-AI, traditional vs sustainable living, atau Gen Z vs Gen Alpha mindset. Contoh: "Bedanya hidup sebelum dan sesudah AI..." atau "Gen Z vs Gen Alpha: siapa yang lebih wise?"

hook_mistake.en: Admit mistakes in technology adoption, sustainability journey, or mental health. Examples: "Fatal mistake when first using AI..." or "Don't be like me: burnout because..."
hook_mistake.id: Akui kesalahan dalam adopsi teknologi, sustainability journey, atau mental health. Contoh: "Kesalahan fatal saat pertama pakai AI..." atau "Jangan sampai kayak aku dulu: burnout karena..."

hook_secret.en: Reveal insider knowledge about AI industry, sustainability tips, or Gen Alpha insights. Examples: "AI secrets only known by tech insiders..." or "Sustainability hacks never shared..."
hook_secret.id: Reveal insider knowledge tentang AI industry, sustainability tips, atau Gen Alpha insights. Contoh: "Rahasia AI yang cuma diketahui tech insider..." atau "Sustainability hacks yang gak pernah dibagi..."

hook_transformation.en: Show transformation with AI tools, sustainable living, or mental health improvement. Examples: "From tech-phobic to AI expert..." or "Mental health transformation in 30 days..."
hook_transformation.id: Tunjukkan transformasi dengan AI tools, sustainable living, atau mental health improvement. Contoh: "Dari tech-phobic jadi AI expert..." atau "Transformasi mental health dalam 30 hari..."

hook_pattern_interrupt.en: Use a pattern interrupt in the first 1-2 seconds: unexpected motion, jump cut, visual glitch, or bold text overlay to force attention. Immediately tie it to the core benefit.
hook_pattern_interrupt.id: Gunakan pattern interrupt di 1-2 detik pertama: gerakan tak terduga, jump cut, visual glitch, atau teks tebal untuk memaksa perhatian. Segera hubungkan ke manfaat utama.

hook_unpopular_opinion.en: Start with a bold, polarizing statement (unpopular opinion) that challenges common beliefs; keep it respectful and data-backed.
hook_unpopular_opinion.id: Mulai dengan pernyataan tegas yang memicu perdebatan (unpopular opinion) yang menantang keyakinan umum; tetap hormat dan didukung data.

hook_myth_busting.en: Bust a common myth with a surprising fact or demo. Lead with the myth, then immediately reveal the truth.
hook_myth_busting.id: Bongkar mitos umum dengan fakta atau demo mengejutkan. Mulai dari mitos, lalu segera ungkap kebenarannya.

hook_before_after.en: Show an eye-catching BEFORE vs AFTER in the first frame. Make the transformation obvious and high-contrast.
hook_before_after.id: Tampilkan BEFORE vs AFTER yang mencolok pada frame pertama. Buat transformasinya jelas dan kontras tinggi.

hook_speedrun_demo.en: Do a speedrun demo: "Watch me do X in 10 seconds". Use fast pacing and timers to build retention.
hook_speedrun_demo.id: Lakukan speedrun demo: "Lihat aku lakukan X dalam 10 detik". Gunakan pacing cepat dan timer untuk menjaga retensi.

hook_stitch_duet_react.en: Open by reacting to a trending clip (stitch/duet). Provide a punchy take in 1 sentence, then add your unique angle.
hook_stitch_duet_react.id: Buka dengan reaksi ke klip trending (stitch/duet). Berikan opini tajam dalam 1 kalimat, lalu tambahkan sudut pandang unik Anda.

hook_no_face_asmr.en: Use faceless/ASMR-style visuals with satisfying sounds; overlay a concise voice/text hook to anchor the benefit.
hook_no_face_asmr.id: Gunakan visual faceless/ASMR dengan suara memuaskan; tambahkan voice/text hook singkat untuk menambatkan manfaat.

hook_testing_for_you.en: "I tested X so you don’t have to" format. Summarize the result upfront, then micro-proof in 2-3 beats.
hook_testing_for_you.id: Format "Aku sudah mencoba X jadi kamu tidak perlu". Ringkas hasil di depan, lalu bukti singkat 2-3 poin.

hook_price_anchor.en: Lead with a price/value anchor: "People pay $299 for this… here’s a $29 alternative". Keep comparisons fair and honest.
hook_price_anchor.id: Mulai dengan anchor harga/nilai: "Orang bayar Rp4,5jt untuk ini… ini alternatif Rp450rb". Jaga perbandingan tetap adil dan jujur.

hook_deal_bonus.en: Lead with an irresistible deal/bonus in the first line (price slash, bundle, extra perks). Be concrete with numbers and time limits. Ex: "Today only: Buy 1 get 2 bonus presets."
hook_deal_bonus.id: Buka dengan penawaran/bonus yang menggoda di kalimat pertama (potongan harga, bundling, bonus). Sertakan angka & batas waktu. Contoh: "Hanya hari ini: Beli 1 bonus 2 preset."

hook_scarcity_urgency.en: Create urgency with real scarcity: limited stock/time window. Use specifics ("Last 12 units", "Ends in 24h").
hook_scarcity_urgency.id: Bangun urgensi dengan kelangkaan nyata: stok/masa promo terbatas. Pakai spesifik ("Sisa 12 unit", "Berakhir 24 jam").

hook_risk_reversal.en: Remove risk upfront: free trial, money-back guarantee, warranty. Make the audience feel safe to act.
hook_risk_reversal.id: Hilangkan risiko di awal: uji coba gratis, garansi uang kembali, garansi servis. Buat audiens merasa aman untuk bertindak.

hook_objection_buster.en: Call out the top 1–2 objections (price/complexity/time) and flip them into benefits immediately.
hook_objection_buster.id: Sebutkan 1–2 keberatan utama (harga/rumit/waktu) lalu balikan jadi manfaat secara langsung.

hook_unboxing.en: Start with a tactile unboxing/reveal. Use sensory verbs and quick cuts; show "what’s inside" in the first seconds.
hook_unboxing.id: Mulai dengan unboxing/reveal yang taktil. Gunakan kata kerja sensorik & cut cepat; tunjukkan "isi di dalam" dalam detik pertama.

hook_authority_expert.en: Lead with credentials/data: years of experience, certifications, “as seen in”, or benchmarks to establish trust.
hook_authority_expert.id: Buka dengan kredensial/data: lama pengalaman, sertifikasi, “telah diliput”, atau benchmark untuk membangun trust.

hook_offer_first_line.en: Put the offer in line one. Use a crisp promise and bullets of what they get next.
hook_offer_first_line.id: Taruh OFFER di kalimat pertama. Janji yang tajam, lanjut poin ringkas soal apa yang mereka dapat.

hook_ai_cocreate.en: Invite the audience to co-create with AI: comment a keyword, upload a photo, or pick a style—then show the AI result.
hook_ai_cocreate.id: Ajak audiens co-create dengan AI: komentar kata kunci, unggah foto, atau pilih gaya—lalu tampilkan hasil AI-nya.

hook_search_intent.en: Match search intent with clear keywords: “Best X for Y 2025”, “How to…”, “Top 5…”. Promise a quick, skimmable answer.
hook_search_intent.id: Selaraskan dengan niat pencarian & kata kunci jelas: “Rekomendasi X buat Y 2025”, “Cara…”, “Top 5…”. Janjikan jawaban cepat & mudah discan.

hook_community_callout.en: Call a tribe by name (creators, students, new moms, gamers). Make them feel seen, then deliver a tailored benefit.
hook_community_callout.id: Panggil komunitas secara spesifik (creator, mahasiswa, new mom, gamer). Buat mereka merasa “diwakili”, lalu beri manfaat yang relevan.

hook_authenticity_proof.en: Lead with raw proof: live screen-recording, no filters, one-take demo. Transparency as the hook.
hook_authenticity_proof.id: Buka dengan bukti mentah: rekam layar live, tanpa filter, one-take demo. Transparansi sebagai hook.
